im was a youth from the town of Eagle Peak in the Storm Horn Mountains of Cormyr in the midâ€“14 century DR.
In the early 1360s DR, Tim was still a fairly young millers son. Once he learned how to ride a horse, locals started talking about the boys bright future as one of the Roadwarden Guard, a knightly order that protected the High Road in Cormyr.
